    • Constructor Detail

      • Ride

        public Ride(java.awt.Point destination,
            Client client,
            double rate,
            double time)
        Initializes ride for client with given destination.
        Parameters:
        destination - The destination for this ride.
        client - The user requesting the ride.
        rate - Price rate used for price calculation.
        time - Time rate used for time calculation.

        public java.lang.String getStatus()
        Gives information on the status of this ride.
        Returns:
        Returns whether the driver is on their way, picking up the user, on route to the destination, or has completed the ride.
